title: Apprentice Software Engineer
experienceGains: Collaborating on coding projects with peers, developing solutions in an agile, project-based environment.
Developing problem-solving and debugging skills by tackling real-world programming challenges.
Refining time management and self-discipline by adhering to project deadlines.
Enhancing teamwork and communication skills through peer code reviews and collaborative project development.
Participating in hackathons and safeguarding events, demonstrating resilience, teamwork, and the ability to perform under pressure.
Strengthening version control skills by using Git for collaboration and maintaining code repositories with peers.
Working on independent projects to learn new technologies and programming languages through self-guided, hands-on projects.

title: Full Stack Engineer (Contractor)
experienceGains: Designed and developed a responsive front-end interface using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Designed the application architecture and its database schema.
Created custom Django templates to generate dynamic web pages based on user input.
Implemented user authentication and authorization using Django's built-in authentication framework.
Providing ongoing maintenance and support, including bug fixes, feature enhancements, and performance optimizations.

title: Industrial Attachee
experienceGains: Developed and maintained web applications using a variety of programming languages and frameworks, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Django.
Conducted quality assurance testing and debugging to ensure website functionality and resolved any issues that arose.
Designed and developed custom content management systems (CMS) to allow easy update and management of the website content.
Got introduced to the world of data (Data Science/Machine Learning/Artificial Intelligence).
